author: CNET
description: Casio has officially brought its sold out $429 AI pet companion for those who’ve always wanted a pet but never had the chance to and for those experiencing loneliness. Would you get one of these? #casio #ai #robot #pets #toys
title: Meet Moflin, A $429 AI Pet Companion Robot

author: CNET
description:
Power-Up Bands at Universal’s Super Nintendo World have a trick beyond the theme park. CNET’s Bridget Carey explains how to use the wristband as an Amiibo to get extra power-ups in Nintendo Switch games.

You can find the products mentioned in this video linked below
